org.mobicents.slee.container.deployment.jboss
Class DeployableComponent

java.lang.Object
  org.mobicents.slee.container.deployment.jboss.DeployableComponent

public class DeployableComponent
extends java.lang.Object

This class represents a SLEE Deployable Component such as a Profile Specification, Event Type Definition, RA Type, Resource Adaptor, SBB or Service. It also contains the dependencies and the install/uninstall actions needed for that component.

Version:
1.0
Author:
Alexandre Mendon√ßa

isDeployable

public boolean isDeployable(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> deployedComponents)
Method for checking if the component is deployable, ie, meets the pre-reqs.

Parameters:
deployedComponents - a Collection with the IDs of the already deployed components.
Returns:
true if it can be deployed.

Returns:
